features: The fluorocarbon-free PU outer coating makes the material waterproof and gives the product a modern and contemporary aesthetic
Roll-top system to scale capacity closes with a hook and loop fastener
Zipped fast access to the main compartment
Three pockets outside for e.g. bike lock or umbrella
High quality neoprene laptop compartment (up to 15.4“) with two additional mesh pockets for phone and wallet
Additional elastic band bottle holder and key strap inside
Reinforced back with padding for more comfort
Padded and adjustable shoulder straps for more comfort
Embossed 'Ucon Acrobatics‘ label on the front side
Shell material: Soft and durable surface from polyurethane (PU) with a backside from polyester (PET), PVC & PFC-free
Dimensions rolled out: 56 x 28 x 10 cm
Dimensions rolled in: 42 x 28 x 10 cm
tech_specs.\u2022 Sustainable & high quality materi: We use ecological recycled PET fabric. All our materials are vegan, free of AZO dyes & heavy metals.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nBoarding completed: All products comply with international cabin baggage regulations and can be taken into the cabin of any airline.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nMinimalist design from Berlin: Our products are designed in Berlin and reflect minimalism, innovation and functionality.
tech_specs.\u2022 PETA: We are an official partner of PETA. Neither animals nor humans suffer for our products.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nB-Corp: We partnered up with B-Corp and use business as a force for good.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nSave the Children: We support the school children of Berlin with our backpacks.
